column3: Tend to NACK here for the comments given above. Imo, it would be more helpful if `contrib/gitian-build.sh` was rewritten to python to make it more user friendly. I don't see any increase in user-friendliness in this pull request as is.
Addressed the first comment. There is nothing I can do about the second comment :)

Agree with @marcofalke here on ~NACK. I think #13366 did the important changes here. We can forever keep creating PRs to change straggler occurrences in obscure places, but the added value is little compared to the overhead.\n\nAlso agree with converting `contrib/gitian-build.sh` to python.
Can be fixed up as part of #13362 or not at all.
Should be going away in #13617. I can cherry-pick some of the other changes here into that.
